mapper.select: select id, comment, created_by_anonymous, created_by, updated_by, DATE_FORMAT(created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS created_at, DATE_FORMAT(updated_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS updated_at from t_school_comment tsc where tsc.school_id = #{schoolId} and tsc.is_deleted = 0 order by id desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_school_comment ( school_id, school_name, comment, created_by_anonymous, created_by ) VALUES ( #{schoolId}, #{schoolName}, #{comment}, #{createdByAnonymous}, #{createdBy} )
